definitions.body: search (for), sq. acc. Pr 23:30, Job 32:11; abs. [[וְדָרַשְׁתָּ֫ וְחָקַרְתָּ֫]] [[וְשָׁאַלְתָּ֫ הֵיטֵיב]] De 13:15; lit. Ez Eze 39:14 (i.e. for bones unburied).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: search through, explore, lit., obj. [[הארץ]] Ju Jdg 18:2 (‖[[רַגֵּל]]) v:Jdg 18:2, 1Ch 19:3 (‖ id.); city [[העיר]] 2Sa 10:3 (‖ id.), of mining Job 28:3; search out a subject or matter Job 5:27, Job 28:27, Pr 25:2, Ps 44:22.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: search a man, find out his sentiments (AV sound him) 1Sa 20:12.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of examining thoroughly, so as to expose weakness in a case Job 29:16, Pr 18:17, cf. Pr 28:11; so of self-examination [[דרכים]] ´[[ח]] La 3:40 (‖[[חפשׂ]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נֶחְקַר]] 1Ki 7:47, 2Ch 4:18; Impf. [[יֵחָקֵר]] Je 46:23; [[יֵחָֽקְרוּ]] Je 31:37 be searched out, found out, ascertained, 1Ki 7:47, 2Ch 4:18 (weight of the bronze used in temple utensils), of forest Je 46:23; searched out, Je 31:37 subj. [[מוסדי־]] [[ארץ]]

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[חִקֵּר]] Ec 12:9 he sought out many proverbs ([[מְשָׁלִים]]; ‖[[אִזֵּן]]).
